SEARCH

Uses of Package
JEST.model.cards

Packages that use JEST.model.cards
Package
Description
JEST.controller
This package contains the controller of the application : ConsoleController : It permits the interactions between the user and the console, using the scanner.
JEST.model
This package contains the controller of the application : Game : This is the most important class of the game.
JEST.model.cards
This package contains all the classes linked to the cards in the game : A Card is a SuitCard or a JokerCard.
JEST.model.cards.trophy
This package contains all the trophies of the game : We have the interface Trophy which is implemented by the 6 classes for each trophy.
JEST.model.virtualPlayer
This package contains the three strategies possible for VirtualPlayer : We have the AgressiveStrategy, the DefensiveStrategy and the RandomStrategy.
JEST.view
This package contains the classes adapted to the view of the application : We have the MainWindow and all the panels.
  • Classes in JEST.model.cards used by JEST.controller
    Class
    Description
    Card
    This is a general card : we define the Trophy of the card, and declare abstract the methods to get the face value and the suit (we define them if it is a SuitCard.
  • Classes in JEST.model.cards used by JEST.model
    Class
    Description
    Card
    This is a general card : we define the Trophy of the card, and declare abstract the methods to get the face value and the suit (we define them if it is a SuitCard.
    Deck
    This class defines the decks : we can shuffle it, fill it...
    Jest
    This class defines the list of Cards that the
    invalid reference 
    Player
    detains during all the game.
    Offer
    In each round, each
    invalid reference 
    Player
    have to make an offer and choose an other one.
  • Classes in JEST.model.cards used by JEST.model.cards
    Class
    Description
    Card
    This is a general card : we define the Trophy of the card, and declare abstract the methods to get the face value and the suit (we define them if it is a SuitCard.
    CardVisitor
    This interface allows access to the scores obtained by the SuitCards or the JokerCard.
    Deck
    This class defines the decks : we can shuffle it, fill it...
    DeckType
    This enum class permits to define the two types of Deck fixed by the design pattern Multiton : the general and the "restOfCards".
    Jest
    This class defines the list of Cards that the
    invalid reference 
    Player
    detains during all the game.
    JokerCard
    There is one joker among the cards.
    OfferCard
    An offerCard is a Card in an offer.
    Suit
    Define each suit and its strength.
    SuitCard
    It defines a Card with a Suit.
